name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InstaBlood - Be A Donor, Save Lives.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension mitigates the problem of dissemination of blood requirement. Install & receive info of the person in need. Be a hero!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InstaBlood connects people in emergency to donors irrespective of caste, creed and gender.
It is a platform which helps combat the pain people suffer, when they are in need. Search for the blood group in need and connect to donors instantly. 

As we say, saying is easy! Yes indeed it is, we want people to get aware and disseminate, so that more and more donors are on board. As rightly, a great person said, when you do something good for the society, the rest society does for you. 
We want the rest to be done by the society. We have the power to pacify the grief, we have the power to wipe away the tears. Join hands and help us make a better connected society.

Through this Chrome Extension, we can mitigate the problem of sharing the information of blood requirement across the globe. Every responsible citizen around can install the extension and receive the information about the person in need and their contact. 
Join hands in saving lives !

Get in touch with us & share your feedback : info@invincix.com
Follow & Visit us: https://www.invincix.com
Get the android application: https://goo.gl/wP3Qv6
